story: You hear a loud beeping sound coming from behind a nearby container. As you investigate, you see a group of robotic drones flying erratically towards you. What do you do?

actions.action: Attack the drones with your cybernetic arm
actions.good: With quick reflexes and expert maneuvers, you destroy each and every one of the robotic drones, reaping their valuable components. Your combat skills pay off.
actions.bad: In your haste to destroy the robotic drones, you accidentally damage a nearby container, causing it to collapse on top of you, dealing severe damage.

actions.action: Avoid confrontation and flee the area
actions.good: With quick feet and agility, you escape from the scene before any harm comes your way. You avoid losing valuable resources.
actions.bad: As you attempt to flee the area, one of the robotic drones catches up to you and deals heavy damage. You narrowly escape with your life but lose some of your precious loot.

actions.action: Discover why the drones were attacking in the first place
actions.good: As you delve deeper into the source of the robotic drone's hostility, you discover a hidden cache filled with valuable items. You gain valuable insights into your enemies and their methods.
actions.bad: While investigating the root cause of the robotic drones' aggression, you accidentally stumble upon a concealed trap, taking heavy damage in the process.
